description: In a cavernous, infernal setting, a large, horned figure resembling the Devil sits on a throne-like structure, holding a trident. Two smaller, monstrous figures approach him, one holding a fire extinguisher labeled 'FIRE EXTING.', while the other clutches a large, patterned sack. The scene presents an absurd situation where a tool designed to suppress fire is being confiscated in a realm defined by intense heat and flames. The irony highlights the comical futility of bringing such an item to this environment, suggesting a prisoner's desperate, yet illogical, attempt to escape the very nature of his punishment.
caption: “Yes, sir ... we caught him trying to smuggle this in under his coat.”
